query:
SELECT s.id, s.status, s.completedHotels, s.totalHotels, COUNT(sr.id) as results_count, AVG(sr.price) as avg_price
FROM scans s
LEFT JOIN scanResults sr ON s.id = sr.scanId
WHERE s.id = 30001
GROUP BY s.id;
command:

WHERE s.id = 30001
